intro: Stichorkis robusta, commonly known as the robust stichorkis, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its woody stems and small, clustered leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, and it produces small, red berries that are edible. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates and is often found in forested areas.
